subject: Logos
Football
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Lions introduced a fiercer-looking logo as they rebrand themselves after an N.F.L.-first 0-16 record last season. With sharper teeth, the Lions’ logo has undergone the most significant change since it was first placed on the team’s helmet in 1961, according to a news release.
